post.description: Return paginated policy with alert count based on the input filter along with next pagination token
Return paginated groups with alert count based on the group by policy field, input filter along with next pagination token

get.description: Given an alert-id in the query the API returns the data that can be presented in a graphical format. The returned response matches the JSON Graph Format standard

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The alert-id for the evidence graph

schema.description: The alert-id for the evidence graph

400.description: Bad Request - request body contains a query that is not grammatically valid

401.description: Unauthorized - user cannot be authenticated to service the request

403.description: Forbidden - user is not authorized, or does not have the correct permissions, to make the call

412.description: PreConditions Failed - query fails domain specific validations

429.description: Too Many Requests - API is getting rate limited

customerId.description: Customer Id associated to the Alert.

stackName.description: Stack Name associated to the Alert.

fields.description: Field Name for the filter that will be retrieved.

items.description: Field Name for the filter that will be retrieved.

disableTrackTotalHit.description: Tracks the total hits for a search request

skipCustomerIdFilter.description: Stack level search request, basically skip customerId filter in the ES query

externalResourceId.description: External Resouce Id.Id Provided by the cloud provider

verdict.description: Verdict from Config Scanner used for Create Alerts.

nextPageToken.description: token to fetch the next page

sortBy.description: Array of sort properties. Append **:asc** or  **:desc** to the key to sort by ascending or descending order respectively. Example sort properties are **id:asc** and **timestamp:desc**

items.description: Array of sort properties. Append **:asc** or  **:desc** to the key to sort by ascending or descending order respectively. Example sort properties are **id:asc** and **timestamp:desc**

size.description: Maximum number of items to return. When data is paginated, maximum number of items per page.The maximum cannot exceed 500. The default is 50

nextPageToken.description: Setting this pagination Token to the **nextPageToken** from a response object returns the next page of data

group.description: group by field, for example : policy type, compliance standard etc

totalAlerts.description: sum of all alert count for all policies in the group

totalPolicies.description: number of policies in the group

criticalAlertCount.description: alert count for policies with critical severity in the group

highAlertCount.description: alert count for policies with high severity in the group

mediumAlertCount.description: alert count for policies with medium severity in the group

lowAlertCount.description: alert count for policies with low severity in the group

informationalAlertCount.description: alert count for policies with informational severity in the group

GroupsResponse.description: List of groups for selected group by field

AlertDetails.description: Alert details Model for L3 page

AlertRuleNotificationConfigModel.description: Model for Alert Rule Notification Config

prismaId.description: Internal use to pass query parameters in http calls

additionalProperties.description: Additional details like subject and attachments for email , incidentType, findingsKey, evenStatus for service_now

details.description: Additional details like subject and attachments for email , incidentType, findingsKey, evenStatus for service_now

Translation.description: Translation details that will be used as the notification payload in Dispatch mode

alertStatus.description: Alert status. Possible values: open, resolved, dismissed, snoozed, pending_resolution

AlertStatusAggregateResponse.description: List of aggregate alert status response

value.description: List of aggregate alert status response

nodes.description: A dictionary of the node identifier and the associated node

graphs.description: The list of graphs representing a primary asset and its associations

lastModifiedAt.description: Last modified time for the asset

assetApiId.description: The unique API Identifier of this asset

additionalProperties.description: Returns additional metadata associated with this capability

additionalCapabilityAttributes.description: Returns additional metadata associated with this capability

errors.description: The error message for cloud network graph.

items.description: The error message for cloud network graph.

CloudNetworkGraph.description: Represents the associated network graph for this finding

nodes.description: The nodes associated with this network graph

paths.description: The associated paths in the network graph

items.description: The associated paths in the network graph

nativeID.description: The native ID of the node

name.description: Name of the data sensitivity datatype

count.description: The count of occurances for the given data type

label.description: The label for the given data type

lastModifiedAt.description: Time when the finding was reported

FindingRemediationDetails.description: Represents the RemediationDetails for this finding

GraphAlertEvidenceGraph.description: The list of graphs representing a primary asset and its associations

relationshipTypeId.description: Relationship Type ID between the edges

IAMPermissionGraph.description: Represents the associated permission graph for this finding

Node.description: A dictionary of the node identifier and the associated node

NodeDataType.description: The nodes associated with this network graph

nativeID.description: The native ID of the node

Path.description: The associated paths in the network graph

label.description: Label representing the primary asset name

patchable.description: Boolean value representing whether this vulnerability is patchable

exploitable.description: Boolean value representing whether this vulnerability is exploitable

published.description: Long value representing when the vulnerability was published

x-redlock-auth.description: The x-redlock-auth value is a JSON Web Token (JWT).
x-redlock-auth.name: x-redlock-auth
